concept.title: Qualitative Grading
concept.shortdesc: Because written papers are qualitative in nature, some instructors prefer to grade them based on a letter grade (as opposed to a quantitative number). If you want to have content that explains how qualitative grading may work with regard to written deliverables, you can include such a section.

conbody.p:
You could include the following information as a subsection to the grading section to explain quantitative grading as it may apply to graded deliverables:
A statement that qualitative grading is applied to written work
A matrix that maps letter grades to numeric grades

example.title: Example
example.p:
Because projects and papers are qualitative, I grade them using letter grades. However, because the final grade is based on a quantitative score, I must convert the letter grade to an equivalent numeric grade to use in each componentâ€™s scoring formula. The following table shows the equivalent numeric grade I use for each letter grade:
